pages.text: With a handful of steam processing capability, you can now move on to making circuits and steam turbines.$(p)The $(item)Primitive Circuit/$ is the first and only one you can make right now. It's rather expensive, requiring several components, but will get easier later on.

The first machines you should look at are the $(item)Wiremill/$, $(item)Bending Machine/$, and $(item)Lathe/$, which will make basic materials more efficiently.$(p)After that, an $(item)Assembler/$ will help with circuit components and other components, as it's more precise than your hands.
